GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/review/:review_id.description: serves an object with the review by the given review_id

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: updates the review with review_id by incrementing the votes by the number given in the parameter inc_votes from the body. Returns the updated review

GET /api/review/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of objects with the comments of the review with review_id given
